spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The cleric is a 18th level spellcaster with Mage multiclass, therefore it can use spells of either class. Your spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell resist {@dc 20} and spell attack modifier +12).

trait.name: Divine Strike
entries: Once for turn, when the cleric hits a creature with a weapon attack, the cleric deals additional {@damage 2d8} radiant damage.

trait.name: War Priest
entries: When the cleric use the Attack action, it can make one weapon attack as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cleric can make 3 attacks each turn.

action.name: Nightmare's Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

monster.name: Nightmare Zombie
languages: understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

trait.name: Tackle
entries: The zombie runs toward your opponent to make a

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the zombie moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a bite attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The zombie can make up to 2 attacks each turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d6 + 1}) slashing damage, plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) psychic damage.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The Shredder's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The Shredder deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Shredder fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Shredder makes three attacks. He also uses Frightful Presence.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of Shredder's choice within 120 feet of him and aware of him must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. These later saves have disadvantage if Baphomet is within line of sight of the creature.
If a creature succeeds on any of these saves or the effect ends on it, the creature is immune to Shredder's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Swords
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) slashing damage.

legendary.name: Suffering
entries: This action can be used only once per turn. The Shredder split the last round damage taken with an enemy, recovering half the damage and inflicting half of it to that chosen enemy.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The Shredder makes an attack.
